title: Plaque
description:
The plaque is of the conventional type found in foundation deposits of this period. The glaze was originally very brilliant blue but is now considerably deteriorated. At the left of the upper surface is a large cartouche in the upper part of which is the name of Amon. The lower part is probably an additional title. 
Condition: surface weathered, some in-crustation.
credit_line: Gift of the Egypt Exploration Society

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
